page.title: 07Kilfrost Park _ Haltwhistle
page.content: The people who built{Kilfrost}made a park in front of the factory buildings. They planted lots of trees to hide the big storage tanks, made lawns and flower beds beside the river. People go for a walk down the Tyne. They just sit on the seats and watch the fish jump for the flies. I go fishing, ride my bicycle, and sometimes I fly my kite there. We go paddling and try to cross the river at the{Alston Arches.} We can't swim because it's too shallow and the eels might bite you. At the other side of the Arches it is too deep and dangerous. Sometimes on November 5th and other special occasions we go to Kilfrost to watch the firework displays held on the other river bank.
